snippet.title: Hide The Corpse | Launch Trailer | Meta Quest Platform
snippet.description:
Game on Meta Store : https://vr.meta.me/s/1KCekYgdlbl9sEA
Join our Discord : https://discord.gg/zKNqN8Xyxd

Get ready for a hilarious and chaotic experience with Hide The Corpse – the ultimate physics puzzle VR game where you must hide the body before the cops show up! Set in a wacky, 70s-inspired world, this arcade comedy has already taken the internet by storm. Get ready to dive into the madness when Hide The Corpse launches on Meta Quest!

Available now on Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest 3 and Meta Quest Pro.

Shoutout to awesome creators behind this trailer: @AWolfinVR  @Fynnpire  @WhackyCast  @Fudgyyyy  @Jeaire  @Xifolmao  @SoulFoxGaming  @GAMERTAGVR 

#HideTheCorpse #VRGames #MetaQuest #IndieGame #GameDev #PhysicsPuzzle #ArcadeComedy #VirtualReality #IndieDev #DarkHumor #Realcast

© Realcast 2024
